item.title: Flying Moon in Space + Game Boy Advance + DJ Harald Krishna
item.description: Sa 27.9. Income Tax Refund presents @Spxlxnkx Doors 19h30 Rock 20h30 Flying Moon in Space (technokraut/leipzig) FMIS music springs from hours-long live improvisations that fuse hypnotic krautrock, vivid psychedelic pop, and techno-tinged electronics. Incl. members from Dolphins, Lovely Heroin, Creams and Hologram Hug. ig bc + Game Boy Advance (krautypsychgemz/Ukraine) school of psych rock insta bc + DJ Harald Krishna poster by @oipaltus

item.title: H√©lo√Øse + Abrichten
item.description: fri 5th sept Ha&Mo Doors 1930 Start 2000 H√©lo√Øse (CH) No-wave drums and lo-fi toy organs as played by Z√ºrich-based cantautrice Sabina Leone. @ all you Casio keyboard worshippers: don’t miss this one. Video / Bandcamp / Instagram Abrichten (Lpz) Another rare chance to see your local vintage noiserock heralds - with some new stompers in petto from their upcoming album. Especially suitable for fans of Slayer and Irmtraud Morgner.

item.title: Michael Beach + Peugeot Brigitte
item.description: Save the date! Tuesday 29.07.2025 Income Tax Refund & F6 present MICHAEL BEACH [Melbourne/AUS] boundary-pushing songwriter whose work blends raw garage‚Äëpunk grit with moments of intimate piano-driven reflection. Critics have praised Dream Violence for its ‚Äúexistential dread exorcised through heady guitar rockers and intimate ballads,‚Äù melding folk‚Äëblues, Velvet Underground echoes, and Bruce‚ÄëSpringsteen‚Äëstyle storytelling BC | WEB PEUGEOT BRIGITTE [LE] new kinky-cosmic-c(o)untry-punk outfit in town feat. members of Ambulanz, New Adults, … IG | BC

item.title: Save Bucks + Citron Citron + Warm Swords
item.description: Next one just around the corner!! ITR (https://itritritr.netlify.app/upcoming/) presents on Wed, 28th MAY at Kxrl Hxlgx // LE-WEST from 20h00. Goblin foot by vincy @Bincent3000 (https://www.instagram.com/bincent3000/) SAVE BUCKS [LE-UA] New project in town! These kids play a raw & refreshing mix of country, indie & garage rock. Lineup includes members of Game Boy Advance (See You! Recs (https://seeyou.bandcamp.com/) / Ukraine) and TTTurbo (https://ttt-turbo.bandcamp.com/). Recordings out soon! Citron Citron [CH] Citron Citron are a brother&sister pop synth√©triste duo based in Geneva, CH.

item.title: Alien Nosejob + Mr. Strong + Sa Yuu
item.description: Monday, 30.06.25 - 18:00 - Hitness Club Medea Projekt & Income Tax Refund present: Alien Nosejob Initially a solo project by Australian musician Jake Robertson, it has grown into a full band known for its diverse sound and global performances. IG Mr. Strong Hailing from Galway and based in Leipzig, Mr. Strong merges Indie Rock & post-punk with noisy synths. The lyrics about lobotomies and hereditary trauma are infused with sarcastic Irish wit and Dadaist wordplay, turning modern absurdities into sharp, ironic hooks.

item.title: Bloody Death + HALF DARLING + Inessa Anxious + Luke Kiid
item.description: Thu 3rd july SPXLXNKX income tax refund presents Doors 1930 Start 2000 Bloody Death (UK) lofi loser rock for winners bloodydeath.bandcamp.com // bloodydeathdood.carrd.co HALF DARLING (AT) alt. weirdo pop rock frm Vienna, Austria Half Darling is a Vienna‚Äëbased alt‚Äëweirdo pop‚Äërock collective that fuses punk, noise, hip‚Äëhop and minimalist loops into catchy yet disrupting three‚Äëminute rockets. Their self‚Äëtitled debut (June 2023) bursts with riot‚Äëgrrrl energy, feminist grit, and danceable hooks. Originally Gregor Mahnert‚Äôs solo loop project, Half Darling grew into a full band featuring Lisa Kortschak (vox), Elise Mory (synth), Oliver Stotz (bass/synth), Johanna Forster (guitar) and Werner Thenmayer (drums).

item.title: Tr√° Ph√°id√≠n + B√∂.senberg + YASS
item.description: Soon at Spxlxnkx - ITR presents yet again on Tuesday June 10th. Doors 19h00 Start 20h00 T r √° P h √° i d √≠ n [Noisy Dada Irish Post Folk Rock, IRL] are a nine-piece ensemble from Connemara, Ireland, blending traditional Irish music with jazz, post-rock, and experimental sounds. Their richly layered instrumentation and fluid compositions move between ambient textures, rhythmic grooves, and improvisation. BC | IG | Rev

item.description: Sunday June 1st: Omni Schmidt &&& Income Tax Refund team up to present you a children’s day special festivity outside at Cours de Gxllx in Halle Salle! Pls be there on time and get in touch with us if you want to help at entrance or bar: fritz@u-bac.de doors from 15h30 bands from 16h30 STRICT (!!) curfew: 20h00 for the sake of the neighbors, show is happening outside! Ants get looose poster by Ga√´lle Cordeaux.

item.title: DuChamp + Felix-Florian T√∂dtloff
item.description: ITR & CxHxHx… …are proud to bring you a little warmup including drones and ambiences. DuChamp [brln] Federica Rossella of SuperCheri and Pieuvre and also running Berlin’s Kitchen Leg Records is on tour with her solo project DuChamp, once more draping us in sonic surroundings of accordion drones, guitar rackets and according pedal feedback loops. DuChamp is an Italian scientist, musician and curator based in Berlin, religiously devoted to drone. Drone is related to a precise childhood memory: the sound of the hair dryer, that her mother used to fix her hair.

item.title: Giulio Erasmus & Ex-Worm 3000 + VMO aka. Violent Magic Orchestra
item.description: ITR & Hitness Club present: ( ¬∑ ‚ùõ ÷ä ‚ùõ) ‘Ö(‚Äæ‚å£‚Äæ‘Ö) (‚äô _ ‚äô ) Giulio Erasmus & Ex-Worm 3000 [brussels / manchester] Giulio Erasmus (of the funky formations Handle and D.U.D.S.) is back with the band: Ex-Worm 3000 or The End of the Worm or The Worm Parade or Paradigm or whatever they’re called this time around. Once again, bringing a fine, dub-infused blend of James Chance-esque no-wave punk and a soulfulness inherited from classics like The Specials with plenty of delay slapped on the synths, percussion jinglings all over, lovely harmonies and enchaining bass lines.

item.title: Omni Selassi + Almond Butyl + Sensor Ghost + DJ Ernie
item.description: Thursday June 5th Income Tax Refund invites you to Spxlxnkx/Le West. Doors 19h00 Start 20h00 Ants get loose poster by Gaelle Cordeaux. DJ set before-inbetween-after by MISS TAKE OMNI SELASSI [CH/LE] genre-defying trio formed in 2019. Since then, the band (Rea (vocals, guitar, synth), Mirko (drums, electroharp) and Lukas (drums, synth)) has been relentlessly active across stages throughout Europe and beyond. Their sound is unpredictable and ever-shifting: part pop, part punk, part ritual, always experimental.

item.title: Roger and the Pacemaker + Tavare + Nina Garcia + The New Solarism
item.description: Nxxt ITR (http://itr.root.sx/) festivity just around the corner on easter-Sat 19.4. @RXCYCLXNG MVSEVUM [geezer str./LeWest] Roger and the Pacemaker [CH+JAP] PunkImproDuo = Seijiro Murayama & Roger F√§hndrich, born in 1957 and 1982. One improvised with Keiji Haino at the time the other was improvising walking. “We don’t make music, but we play test gigs using voice, drums, electric guitar and lyrics.” link The New Solarism [Le] exp. neo classic “melt away listening to the dreamy music of The New Solarism ‚Äì solo endeavour of Leipzig ‚Äì based Izabela Ka≈Çdu≈Ñska.

item.title: Schade + Rouge Gorge + Weird Ugly Fish + Sheik Anorak
item.description: I.T.R + Claws of Saurtopia teaming up to present you a noisy pop evening at Hitness Club. First performance has to start 19h30!! Doors 18h30 Poster by HOLOB - Risos available at the gig. Schade [new wave disco psych] (CH) The duo Schade came into existence in 2013 as a result of the collaboration between two active figures in the Swiss alternative music scene, Brynjar Thorsson (Welington Irish Black Warrior, Cochon Double) and Dany Digler (Dee Diglers, Los Orioles, Love Cans, TrashMantra).

item.title: De Klok + Lohn der Angst + Telesatan
item.description: ITR & H.C. present: Sunday 26th Jan - Early Show !! doors: 17:00 / start: 18:00 / curfew bands : 22:00 (!!) üï∞Ô∏èüï∞Ô∏è DE KLOK üï∞Ô∏èüï∞Ô∏è (world) Minimalistic mystery pop by the clue chasers De Klok, who recorded their spontaneous first album under one moon and one sun during an intense session of investigation, bribery, calculations, doubts, and beard-scratching. Dive into this post-spy-punk world, made up of croony voices, hypnotic basslines, and lo-fi drums, by the three international agents Charmaine‚Äôs Names, Kabaal, and Constance Chlore / Panoptique.

item.title: Nina Harker + Blumes
item.description: ITR & T//F present: 21 Nov 2024 doors 19h00 startttt 19h30 @ R21 Nina Harker (collage music .FR) polyglot poetry, alien samples, ulterior melodies by the French duo of Apolline Sch√∂ser and Nocola Henry‚Äîcreating a special, spatial vortex for this tour. see you in the pit. nina harker (Aguirre, 2023) Blumes (attic music .LPZ) right here’s the opportunity to witness the d√©but solo show of Blumes‚Äîmember of Mellie, Go Lamborghini Go, Molde and others‚Äîwho’s crafted a bunch of new, multisource, detuned, lo-fi carols for guitar, voice and other objects.

item.title: Camilla Battaglia + Fyodor Stepanov + Harte Echtzeit
item.description: ITR & P0x00T present: 20 Sept 2024 üö™s 20h00 ‚≠êt 20h30 Camilla Battaglia (extended vocal mystifications, Italia) …is an Italy-based musician performing experimental electronics centered around vocal performance with extended singing techniques, which are layered and juxtaposed with glitched-out sounds created and manipulated with SuperCollider resulting in poetic excursions and soundwise expeditions. camillabattaglia.bandcamp.com Fyodor Stepanov (glitchscapes and broken transmissions, Leipzig) …who’s been visiting Pracht not too long ago as part of glitch A/V duo TraumaZone (alogside Ksenia Bashmakova) is gonna present a brainy new solo set this time that consists of with Markov chains (that is the cooler and more oldschool alternative to GenAI) and electromagnetic noise recordings arranged into intangible waves of sound.

item.title: Atol Atol Atol + Nape Neck + Senthul√† + Luna Vega + Neuk√∂llner Speed Dating Club
item.description: ITR + Annoyed By Death + OMNI present: Luna Vega (Leipzig) Luna Vega‚Äôs first studio efforts involved just a preset drum machine + Vermona organ, often nodding to 70s proto-electronic pioneers. The project has now evolved into a 3piece live band: repetitive drum machine patterns, multi-layered organs, wonky synths, 90’s psych guitars. Spaced-out nostalgia-powered grooves for the heads of the 2020’s. BC IG Neuk√∂llner Speed Dating Club (Leipzig) …started as a solo project based around samplers, drum machines, synthesizers and keyboards, but now performs with a constantly changing line-up of various instruments.

item.title: Lemongrab + Doc FLippers + Neon Lies
item.description: ITR presents: 18.6.24 @ TV Studio Ost doors 19h30 startttt 20h02 upstairs Lemongrab (Cnd/Brln) Since their relocation from Toronto to Berlin in 2019 Lemongrab formed a new configuration which has made a quick yet lasting impression in the Berlin and wider European punk scene. Renowned for their raw and cathartic live shows and heavy but playful songwriting. IG BC YT Doc FLippers (Lpz) modern space cowboys who take us in a rocket with punky, psychedelic country music to the other side of the galaxy to drop us into a black hole.

item.title: Marius Atherton + Gelbart + OORT CLOUD
item.description: Next ITR show!!! date: fri, 5th july 2024 doors: 19h30 start: 20h00 MARIUS ATHERTON/ baroque synth ballads, paris beachy, brill tunes by this ex-Stratocastors member BC // insta GELBART / experimental analog computer pop, bln space age techno, befittingly released on Joyful Noise and Gagarin Records among others bc // insta // tecno OORT CLOUD / squeak rock, ch experiments at the edge between new music, noise, rock and improvisation

item.title: Ryan Davis + Ned Collette + Greedy Vultures
item.description: ITR presents: the grand BBG hangout w/ RYAN DAVIS (solo // Americana, f.f.o. Kurt Vile, David Berman etc.) Happy to have Ryan Davis coming all the way from Louisville back to Leipzig for some folksy storytelling. You may have seen him previously with his band Tropical Trash, or listened to his other projects Equipment Pointed Ankh and Roadhouse. Or maybe not. But it’s class A stuff. Much like with his band State Champion you’re in for some sprawling songs about melancholy, love, loss and all kinds of passions - only this time it’s just guitar, voice and some backing tracks.

item.title: Heavenphetamine + Luna Vega + Neuk√∂llner Speed Dating Club
item.description: Income Tax Refund presents: psych-pop / kraut / experimental evening in Leipzig Ost THURSDAY, May 30th @ XonXanXop | Doors: 19:30 | | Start: 20:00 | Heavenphetamine (Georgia/Ukraine) Heavenphetamine is a Japanese krautrock/postpunk duo composed of Hiroki (keyboard/vocals) and Sara (drums/vocals), sometimes supported by flautist Kira Krempova. Described as a blend of Krautrock and Post-Punk, their musicality strongly reflects the influence of Western indie music. Simultaneously, the underlying Japanese melodies, beats, and Japanese lyrics contribute to crafting an exceptionally exotic sonic landscape.

item.title: AKENKALYPSE
item.description: i.t.r. doesn’t present, but recommends: L’AKENKALYPSE

item.title: Attic Ted + Rea + Roger F
item.description: $$$ i.t.r. & Fartclub present $$$ Attic Ted [San Marcos, Texas USA] Grady’s back in Leipzig and we’re happy to co-release his new album with U-Bac. Attic Ted is an interactive musical performance artist, playing weirdo gothic carnival musical theater, creepy and funny, utilizing cardboard constructed masks, to create a visual experience compounding the quirky bizarro pop music into a surrealist dream. Rea [Bienne, CH] …of Omni Selassi. Drone/Folk/Ambient and Poetry.

item.title: Strza≈Ç w kolano + Zdr√≥j + Ari Raketo & Piet + Clara Fall
item.description: i.t.r. presents Strza≈Ç w kolano (classical guitar knee shot / Wroc≈Çaw) We’re stoked to have two acts from our much venerated music collective Salka coming to town once more. That’s the collective that already garlanded our shows with mind-expanding artists like the Kurws, the Przepych, the Atol Atol Atol or the Bar≈Ç√≥g. This time our inner worlds will be perfused by Jakub Majchrzak (whom you know from the aforementioned Kurws or from ≈ªycia ≈ª√≥≈Çƒá) and his befuddlingly ill-tempered guitar musings under the Strza≈Ç w kolano moniker.

item.title: Ulla Suspekt + Polster + Senthul√†
item.description: ITR presents: Ulla Suspekt (NDW witch house / N√ºrnberg / Verydeeprecords) = bass player, producer and one half of the infamous Taxi Lotta U (album, 2023) Polster (Halle/Saale) = Iva Svoboda + Wilm Beckhoff Sentuhl√† (ritualistic riddims / Valencia / Abstrakce Records) ¬ªSentuhl√† is one of the many aliases of musical jack of all trades Jos√© Guerrero, a long standing figure in the already rich underground scene of Valencia. In this solo excursion he explores the vast possibilities of mechanical repetition, the machine funk of dirtbag rhythms and proper boogie DIY synth music, sculpting a syncopated sound that is both modern and atavistic.

item.title: KUNTARI + Jens Ausderw√§sche + S√©bastien Branche
item.description: ex:in in exile & i.t.r. present KUNTARI (indonesia) Named their genre as Primal-core, KUNTARI is constantly experimented with primitive voices producing animal mating calls with his Trumpet mixed with a tons variation of Indonesian tribal rhythms. The music produced percussive primal sound along with dark ambients, a firm unit and solid of two individuals with Intense dynamic of heavy ancient beats. Their live performances create an organic raw sonically untamed with feral approach.

item.title: Vida Vojiƒá performs ¬ªTiming is Divine¬´ + a reading by Alina Sauernheimer & T.u.B.

Vida Vojiƒá also played in the lovely TELEPATHS lately, or you might know her from releases on PALE MASTER and First Terrace Records.

item.title: Omni Selassi + Space Sch√§del
item.description: income tax refund presents a Sunday congregation on 08 October Where: secondhandshop Doors: 20x00 Start: 20x30 Omni Selassi Probably already in your heavy rotation since their last album dropped, ‘cause you still can’t quite fathom the weird appeal of Omni Selassi’s wandering from inspirited dream sequences to no-waving meanderings to outerworldly exploration in harmony and riddims. If you believe the reviews of their audiences it’s a strange and wholesome trip to participate in live.

item.title: Vomitatrix + BNSU + Knalli
item.description: income tax refund presents Monday, 25 September Where: Sepulnke ~ Le West Doors: 18x30 Noise: 19x00 Vomitatrix (space noise grind/NY,USA) …are Gyna Bootleg (vocals), Rick eye (guitar), Tim Dahl (bass guitar, vocals), Weasel Walter (drums). The band conjures up something you might call ACID-GRIND. It‚Äôs vaguely based on traditional hardcore/grindcore archetypes, but the result is explosive hallucinatory madness, uniquely alchemical to the four personalities which make up the band. The ‚Äúsongs‚Äù are inexplicable structures that take perhaps one tiny grain from the idiom and flesh them out into a vortex of bizarre energy and noise.

item.title: Datashock + Pretty Lightning + Javier Areal Velez
item.description: income tax refund presents Monday, 18 September Where: Ekslepun Doors: 19x00 Start: 19x30 Datashock (krautrockkollektiv / west-geeerrrmini) ‚ÅÇ datashock.bandcamp.com ‚ÅÇ https://www.bureau-b.com/datashock.php ‚ÅÇ https://linktr.ee/datashock All the herbs have been smoked. Datashock deliver a new album: “Geltungsbereich Universum”. Their second for Bureau B and the eighth in a career as an internationally active collective of musicians which has spanned two decades (so far). Space is the place. Pretty Lightning (desertblues / saaaaaarrrrland)

item.title: Atol Atol Atol, Mellie, Planets Are On It
item.description: Next income tax refund show this Friday (13th ‚Äì sorry) at Gleiserei/end of Eisi. Doors: 19h00 ‰∫∫‰∫∫‰∫∫ Start: 20h15 Thanks to Lars Spasz for his ‚ÄûDesign‚Äú https://www.instagram.com/larsspaszdesigns/ ATOL ATOL ATOL (Wroclaw/Poland) [jagged, frantic p-punk] feat. members of Kurws, Ukryte Zalety Systemu and Przepych. Clean, cool basslines intermingling with alarm-sound synths, springy guitars and zesty vocals. It’s rhythmic, it’s repetitive and’s got some dense drum action with funky jam block ’n’ cowbell sprinkles going on, too.

item.title: Jooklo Duo, Mik Quantius, Steffen Roth + Stephan Deller + Gregor Forbes
item.description: Last show for this year! ‰∫∫‰∫∫‰∫∫ Don’t miss it! Doors: 19h00 ‰∫∫‰∫∫‰∫∫ Start: 20h15 Jooklo Duo [psychjazz / Italy] Was about time to bring the Jooklo experience to our little fair city. Roaming the improv and weird music underground already since the mid-00’s, David Vanzan and Virginia Genta (also known through projects such as Golden Jooklo Age, Jooklo Quartet, Jooklo Stellar Tribe, Neokarma Jooklo Trio, New Jooklo Age etc.) will now bring some chakric, mental no-jazz to Leipzig for the first time.

item.title: Ka Baird, T.u.B., Good Luck (DJ)
item.description: Ka Baird (RVNG Intl) Woodwind instruments fans listen up! Ka Baird is coming to our little aviary. Ka are a performer, composer, and sound designer from NYC. They’ve releases out on reliable labels such as RVNG Intl., FRKWYS, and Drag City, plus a whole bunch of psych-folk rite records with Spires That In The Sunset Rise group. As for solo live performances, Ka uses extended vocal, breath and microphone techniques that intermingle with atypical electronic and flutes sounds creating a strange world of sonic fun, improvised noise, strange movements.

item.title: Leep, Rosa Blaulicht, Zad Kokar
item.description: Happy happy happy to be teaming up with PRACHT again (it’s been a while!) to bring you this sweet little package right here: ZAD KOKAR [solo bouncy no-wave shreds] Last Strasbourgeoise standing - ZAD KOKAR - is gonna hit the road solo this time and deliver some screeching and distorted no-wave guitar-noise jams with occassional opportunities to dance and jive. https://petite-nature.bandcamp.com Rosa Blaulicht [deathrock-ish post-punk] https://rosablaulicht.bandcamp.com LEEP [gloomy and slowcore-y]
